title: Hematology Education Module Based on Nursing Pathophysiology

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Project-based learning applying hematology concepts to clinical cases through smartphone-based self-directed learning

learning_goals: Identify and explain the pathophysiological mechanisms of at least three hematological abnormalities
Analyze blood disorder simulation cases and propose at least two appropriate nursing interventions
Apply knowledge acquired through e-learning modules to develop a PBL team project report

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
